footer.title: Intellect
footer.description: Empowering minds through quality education and innovative learning experiences.
footer.stay_connected: Stay connected for updates and educational content.

home.intellect_description_directions: Intellect is a center that prepares students for admission to top universities in Uzbekistan and worldwide: IT, medicine, engineering, linguistics.
home.intellect_description_results: Our students get into clusters 4–5 with scores from 170 to 195. 87% are prize-winners of chemistry and biology olympiads.
home.intellect_description_teachers: Classes are taught by PhD candidates, olympiad winners, and certified IELTS/HSK instructors.

slider.title: Preparation for Clusters 4–5
slider.description: Intensive courses in math, physics, and chemistry — your guaranteed path into IT, medicine, and engineering. Our students average 175+.

slider.title: Medical Disciplines
slider.description: Anatomy, histology, physiology, and biochemistry — explained simply. Perfect for medical school admission and first-year studies.

slider.title: Foreign Languages
slider.description: English, Chinese, Russian — with native speakers and methodology experts. We prepare for IELTS, HSK, TOEFL. Scores from 6.5 to 8.0.

slider.title: Chemistry & Biology Olympiads
slider.description: Win national and international olympiads. Our students are prize-winners of 'Zulfiya', 'Olimp', 'Sharq Talanti'.

slider.title: Individual Programs
slider.description: Flexible schedule, personal tutor, diagnostic of weak areas. Tailored preparation for your goals — from 3 to 12 months.

cards.title: Preparation for Clusters 4–5
cards.description: 92% of our students enter clusters 4–5 with scores from 170 to 195. Personalized approach from diagnosis to final test.

cards.title: Chemistry & Biology Olympiads
cards.description: Our students are prize-winners of national olympiads 'Zulfiya', 'Olimp', 'Sharq Talanti'. We prepare for victories starting from grade 9.

home.blog_subtitle: Read our articles to prepare for admission, olympiads, and exams. Real advice from teachers and alumni.
home.reviews_subtitle: Real success stories from those who got admitted, won olympiads, or passed IELTS.

aziza_rahimova.name: Aziza Rahimova
aziza_rahimova.text: Thanks to your biology and chemistry classes, I won 2nd place at the national olympiad! Teachers explain complex topics simply and clearly.

dilshod_karimov.name: Dilshod Karimov
dilshod_karimov.text: My son got into medical school on cluster 5 with 187 points! We’re especially grateful for the anatomy and physiology prep — that was the hardest part.

sofia_van.name: Sofia Van
sofia_van.text: I scored 7.5 on IELTS! My teacher didn’t just teach the language but tailored lessons to my weak areas. Highly recommend for studying abroad.

mirzakhid_abdullaev.name: Mirzakhid Abdullaev
mirzakhid_abdullaev.text: Got into IT with 172 points. Math and physics courses were especially helpful — they explained even the toughest problems.

nigina_tursunova.name: Nigina Tursunova
nigina_tursunova.text: The biochemistry course saved me in my first year of med school! Now I understand metabolism, enzymes, and DNA. Thank you for making it accessible!

posts.title: Essential Topics in Anatomy for Medical Students
posts.excerpt: Key topics you must know. How to memorize terms without losing your mind. Muscle and bone maps.
